document_data.name: ''Light of Creation''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Light of Creation''''' was an [[item enchantment|enchanted]] [[halberd]] that was wielded by the clockwork [[construct]] [[Bernard (construct)|Bernard]], Guardian of the Enchanted Tower.
document_data.Description: Several lodestones were inset into the shaft of the halberd, sparkling with some blue electrical current.
document_data.Powers: The ''Light of Creation'' possessed a ''+1 enchantment'' and was granted a form of arcane electrocution. Every time it was used to slash a non-construct creature the weapon it electrocuted them as well.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, the ''Light of Creation'' was still in the possession of Bernard as he stood watch of the top floor of the [[Arcane Tower]].
